pullRequest.title: Security documentation updates
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR does a few minor security doc updates based on some recent questions/discussions plus a link to Google Cloud Services
Also CC @gsmet @pedroigor

+== Cloud Services
+
+=== Google
+
